attributes.action: stop proposed closure of Queen Mary's A&E Department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to stop life-saving services being shut down at Queen Mary NHS Trust's Accident and Emergency department.

New proposals have revealed that the busy hospital in Sidcup is considering closing the A&E to all but minor walk-in casualties.

Such a move would endanger lives and place unnecessary pressure on other hosptials, but with your support, we can make these proposals history.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop proposed closure of Queen Mary's A&E Department."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15667.asp

Prime Minister's Office
